topic.title: Download and install Gnu C Library (glibc) patch for Application Lifecycle Service

body.p: Of the images used by ALS, only the constructor images are affected by the glibc vulnerability. In order to update to the images with the glibc vulnerability fixed, please update to 2.0.0.577.
To update the Application Lifecycle Service to include the Gnu C Library (glibc) patch (CVE-2015-7547), follow the same steps as ALS installation.
To update your running environment, do the following:

ul.li: Apply the latest security patches for the Ubuntu operating system of your ALS cluster nodes.
